text: El Chavo Animado, also known as El Chavo Del 8 Serie Animada (), is an animated television series based on the live action television series El Chavo del Ocho, created by Roberto Gómez Bolaños and produced by Televisa, Ánima Estudios and Warner Bros. Animation. It aired on Kids' WB and Canal 5 with 134 episodes aired between 2006 and 2014, and repeats were also shown on Las Estrellas and Cartoon Network since 2014. Category:Cartoon Network series Category:Mexican television series
title: El Chavo Animado
